scripts.boot: docker stack deploy -c docker-compose.yml ab & ./node_modules/.bin/forever start app.js
scripts.dev: node_modules/.bin/nodemon app.js & docker stack deploy -c docker-compose.dev.yml ab
scripts.test: node ./ab-cli/index.js test setup ab && npm run test:wait
scripts.test:boot: env-cmd docker stack deploy -c docker-compose.dev.yml -c ./test/setup/test-compose.yml test_ab
scripts.update: cd developer/web && rm -rf ./assets && git restore . && cd ../appbuilder/AppBuilder/core && git restore . && cd ../../../../ && node ./ab-cli/index.js update dev && cd ./developer/ab_platform_web && npm install -f && cd ../api_sails && npm install -f && cd ../appbuilder/AppBuilder && npm install -f && cd .. && npm install -f && cd ../bot_manager && npm install -f && cd ../config && npm install -f && cd ../custom_reports/AppBuilder && npm install -f && cd .. && npm install -f && cd ../definition_manager/AppBuilder && npm install -f && cd .. && npm install -f && cd ../file_processor/AppBuilder && npm install -f && cd .. && npm install -f && cd ../log_manager && npm install -f && cd ../notification_email && npm install -f && cd ../plugins/ABDesigner && npm install -f && cd ../../process_manager/AppBuilder && npm install -f && cd .. && npm install -f && cd ../relay && npm install -f && cd ../tenant_manager && npm install -f && cd ../user_manager/AppBuilder && npm install -f && cd .. && npm install -f && cd ../web && npm install -f
